Resume Review

3-5 business days
$197

Detailed line-by-line feedback on your resume with specific rewrite suggestions. Our team identifies weaknesses in positioning, bullet structure, and overall narrative—then shows you exactly how to fix them.

What's Included

  • Line-by-line written feedback
  • Bullet point restructuring suggestions
  • Quantification opportunities identified
  • Positioning and narrative assessment
  • Format and layout recommendations
  • One round of follow-up questions

Recommended for Competitive Roles

Resume Rewrite

5-7 business days
$497

Complete resume overhaul from scratch. Our team rebuilds your resume using frameworks proven at top firms—transforming your experience into the positioning that gets callbacks.

What's Included

  • Full resume reconstruction
  • Experience repositioning strategy
  • Optimized bullet point writing
  • Quantified impact statements
  • Industry-standard formatting
  • Two revision rounds included
  • Final PDF and Word delivery

How It Works

01

Submit

Upload your resume and share context on your target roles.

02

Analysis

We analyze against frameworks from successful placements.

03

Optimize

Receive detailed feedback or your rewritten resume.

04

Start submitting to your target firms with confidence.

100% Money-Back Guarantee

If you're not completely satisfied with your resume review or rewrite, we'll refund your payment in full. No questions asked. We stand behind the quality of our work.

Confidential

Your information is never shared or stored beyond delivery.

Expert Review

Reviewed by professionals with direct finance recruiting experience.

Results-Focused

Optimized for getting callbacks, not just looking good.

Not Sure Which Service You Need?

If you have limited time or your resume needs significant repositioning, go with Resume Rewrite. If you want to learn and apply changes yourself, Resume Review gives you the roadmap.
